about.title: About Us
about.blurb_p1: Welcome to B12 Café — where every cup tells a story. We believe in creating a unique experience for our customers by offering special blends, cozy vibes, and unforgettable moments.
about.blurb_p2: Our mission is simple: Be Special. At B12 Café, it’s not just about coffee; it’s about community, passion, and making every visit memorable.
